## Install packages

```{r PRISMA}
library(PRISMAstatement)
```

## Create PRISMA

```{r PRISMA creation}

prisma(found = 750,
       found_other = 123,
       no_dupes = 776, 
       screened = 776, 
       screen_exclusions = 13, 
       full_text = 763,
       full_text_exclusions = 17, 
       qualitative = 746, 
       quantitative = 319,
       width = 800, height = 800)

```


Not very customisable. Consider graphics program instead to customise
